item.title: Think Twice: Enhancing LLM Reasoning by Scaling Multi-round Test-time Thinking
item.description: Boost LLM reasoning by having models ‘Think Twice’! This novel method iteratively refines answers, significantly enhancing accuracy on complex tasks.
